name: Abbey Matron
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Matrons are kindly souls, but don't ask one for an ale."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Aliban's Tower
oracle_text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Ambush
oracle_text: Blocking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't these goons have anything better to do?"
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Ambush Party
oracle_text: First strike, haste
flavor_text:
"Call it a cost of doing business. The best way to protect against thieves is to hire better thieves."
—Eron the Relentless

name: Anaba Bodyguard
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Not all Minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance."
—Eron the Relentless

name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The Shamans? Ha! They are mere craven cows not capable of true magic."
—Irini Sengir

name: Aysen Bureaucrats
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"I would say that our Bureaucrats are no better than vipers—but I shouldn't insult the vipers."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Carapace
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"The tougher to crack, the sweeter the snack."
—Kakra, Sea Troll

name: Cemetery Gate
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black
flavor_text:
"It keeps some out, yes. It also keeps others in!"
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Chandler
oracle_text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact creature.
flavor_text:
"Never brag about the latest wonder you've created, students. Chandler might be listening."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Clockwork Gnomes
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact creature.
flavor_text:
"Until I came to the Floating Isle, I never had to oil the servants."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Clockwork Steed
oracle_text:
Clockwork Steed enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Clockwork Swarm
oracle_text:
Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Coral Reef
oracle_text:
Coral Reef enters the battlefield with four polyp counters on it.
Sacrifice an Island: Put two polyp counters on Coral Reef.
{U}, Tap an untapped blue creature you control, Remove a polyp counter from Coral Reef: Put a +0/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Dark Maze
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"The path of faith is fortunately fraught with failure."
—Irini Sengir

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."
—Autumn Willow

name: Dwarven Trader
flavor_text:
"Their definition of 'fair profit' is certainly novel."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Ebony Rhino
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours."
—Chandler

name: Feast of the Unicorn
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.
flavor_text:
"Some delicacies are not to be savored, save by the callous."
—Baron Sengir

name: Folk of An-Havva
oracle_text: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This town's only for good folk. The rest can go to the city."
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Funeral March
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"This party is such fun—but it's a shame to mourn just one."
—Irini Sengir

name: Giant Albatross
oracle_text:
Flying
When Giant Albatross dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

name: Greater Werewolf
oracle_text: At end of combat, put a -0/-2 counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Greater Werewolf.
flavor_text:
"The wolf-things are no mere beasts, but the lieutenants of the Baron."
—Taysir

name: Headstone
oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Your headstone is the last page in the book of your life."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Hungry Mist
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
flavor_text:
"All things must eat, after all. Even the air can hunger."
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Jinx
oracle_text:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"What wizards upset, the land soon rights."
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Joven
oracle_text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
flavor_text:
"Joven, you're almost as good a thief as I. But Eron hates you even more."
—Chandler

name: Joven's Ferrets
oracle_text:
Whenever Joven's Ferrets attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
At end of combat, tap all creatures that blocked Joven's Ferrets this turn. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

name: Labyrinth Minotaur
oracle_text: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"I doubt any Labyrinth Minotaurs still live—but then again, we Minotaurs are stubborn beings."
—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

name: Leaping Lizard
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into Lizards. It's her way."
—Devin, Faerie Noble

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?"
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Merchant Scroll
oracle_text: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"There's no trade without trust."
—Eron, the Relentless

name: Mesa Falcon
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Prophecy
oracle_text:
Reveal the top card of target opponent's library. If it's a land, you gain 1 life. Then that player shuffles.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Reef Pirates
oracle_text: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player mills a card.
flavor_text:
"Corpses for crew don't sit well with me. Zeki and his dead ship had best keep their distance."
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Renewal
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Roterothopter
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text:
"The Roterothopter is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Samite Alchemist
oracle_text: {W}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
flavor_text:
"Powders and potions are nothing compared to faith."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Sengir Bats
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.
flavor_text:
"They are the eyes of the Baron, and they know your fears."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: Serra Bestiary
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

name: Serra Paladin
oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Would that I could be a Paladin again, but the dead hold no place among their ranks."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: Serrated Arrows
oracle_text:
Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

name: Shrink
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The smallest beast can yet have the greatest heart."
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Torture
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"It helps you pass the time until you die."
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Trade Caravan
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a currency counter on Trade Caravan.
Remove two currency counters from Trade Caravan: Untap target basic land. Activate only during an opponent's upkeep.

name: Willow Faerie
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The Autumn Willow cannot be everywhere at once—that's what her grandchildren are for."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron
